document_data.name: Haddrum
document_data.mainbody: '''Haddrum''' was a [[drug]]. It was an elixir made out of [[dragon]]'s blood and other worse components.{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide|171}}
document_data.History:
In {{yearlink|1373}}, it was smuggled in and out of [[Huorm]], per the elves of [[Al Qahara]].{{cite book/Darkvision|183}} 

It was imported from [[Raurin]] into [[Cormyr]] by the [[Spice Lords]] of [[Marsember]] as of {{yearlink|1479}}.{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide|105}} That same year, it was banned from [[Ragheb]] by its leader, [[Alzubra]], because of the violent fits it could cause.
